::KitKat::
She took the drink and motionted for Cyber Claw to take one as well. 
She motioned for Drillbit, Starscream and Destructor to enjoy the 
drinks while they waited for Aracnia to arrive.

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, kinger01030@c... wrote:
>  Destructor nodded....he went to the counter and pulled out a 
couple of 
> energon drinks. He slipped a close tranqulizer under his cloak. So 
it was not 
> seen. He handed their guests their drinks..."Enjoy"
